svg.title: Comparable Analysis & Synthesis — Phase 6 Deep Dive
svg.desc: Institutional-grade comparable analysis workflow showing how the full universe of potential comps is filtered through rigorous selection criteria and adjustment frameworks to produce the market rent conclusion that feeds Phase 6A lender rent derivation. The critical bridge between market research and cash flow underwriting.
svg.text: PHASE 6 DEEP DIVE — THE CRITICAL BRIDGE TO LENDER RENT DERIVATION
HUD FMR, Census rent data, Walk
Illustrative figures only. Actual comp data sourced per deal.
The foundation for Phase 6A Lender Rent Derivation. Without rigorously selected
and adjusted comps, the lender's underwritten rent has no defensible basis.
Every adjustment is documented and defensible. Minimum 5 rent comps with verified rents.
No broker opinions accepted. Sales comps provide valuation support for Phase 11 risk assessment.
Lender rent is derived FROM these comps. Phase 6A depends entirely on Phase 6.
